attributes.action: Hold a national public inquiry into the grooming of children by gangs.
attributes.additional_details: This would help us to understand, on a national level, the reasons for the crimes and how they were investigated, in order that the country as a whole may improve its prevention and handling of such crimes in the future.
attributes.background: Hold a national public inquiry instead of relying on the outcomes of local inquiries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
